name: The Intrepid
overview: Welcome to operation Winterfox, Lieutenant. Commencing with pre-dropzone procedures. Track down and take out I-SOR agents who are directly responsible for over 35 acts of violence throughout the world and 106 deaths. They have now commandeered a US research station in the antarctic, killing all but one scientist. They demand a nuclear warhead in exchange for the scientist, the base and the tech stored there. This is not an option. Your objectives are 1. Rescue R. Markely, he is a high value asset. 2. eliminate the I-SOR agents.
